NewsItem.HEADLINE: IoT: The Big Picture 2019
NewsItem.SUMMARY: An overall view of the IoT market, with a broad strategic overview of how the market is developing.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast breaks down shipments and revenue for IoT devices in wired, short range wireless, and long range wireless. Breakdowns by application, battery life, cost tier, mobility, latency, throughput, and other key dimensions are provided.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: IoT M2M NB IoT LTE M 5G URLLC Bluetooth BLE ANT Zigbee WiFi HART LoRa Sigfox RPMA Weightless GSM GPRS CDMA WCDMA 3G LTE Satellite LPWA
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-IOT-19 rev0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-IOT-19 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
